## policyIsPrincipalPolicy variable

Type guard to check if a [Policy](./core.policy.md) is a [PrincipalPolicy](./core.principalpolicy.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
policyIsPrincipalPolicy: (policy: Policy) => policy is PrincipalPolicy
```
